After changing the country, all currentl: After changing the country, all currently tuned programmes will be deleted. To re-tune programmes, please go to Auto Tuning. Do you want to continue?
After changing your Zip Code, all curren: After changing your Postcode, all current Freesat programmes will be deleted. To re-tune programmes, please go to Auto Tuning. Do you want to continue?

Assign channels to remote buttons so you: Assign programmes to remote buttons so you can quickly jump to them.
Auto Volume keeps sound volume consisten: Auto Volume keeps sound volume consistent even when you change programmes or broadcast signals.
Automatically optimize picture quality b: Automatically optimise picture quality based on colour and brightness of ambient light.

Changing region may change currently tun: Changing region may change currently tuned programmes in your TV. You can re-tune programmes in Auto Tuning. Do you want to change regional settings now?
Channels from HDMI and other external in: Programmes from HDMI and other external inputs cannot be locked. To lock TV programmes, change the current input to Live TV.
Choose a picture mode, then customize di: Choose a picture mode, then customise display settings such as contrast, brightness and sharpness for that mode.
Choose to have all channels or just your: Choose to have all programmes or just your primary ones when you change programmes.
Current values of customized picture mod: Current values of customised picture mode settings will be applied to {pictureMode} mode for all inputs. Do you want to continue?

Edit TV channels, set favorites, and man: Edit TV programmes, set favourites, and manage parental control settings.
Enable LG support representatives to res: Enable LG support representatives to resolve your technical issues remotely. You must call the LG customer service centre to receive assistance.
Enjoy an immersive 3D soundscape with th: Enjoy an immersive 3D soundscape with the virtual multi-programme surround sound effect.
Experience the best immersive audio effe: Experience the best immersive audio effect with virtual multi-programme surround sound including height.
Export your TV's channel list informatio: Export your TV's programme list information to a connected USB device.
Fine tune red, green, blue, cyan, magent: Fine tune red, green, blue, cyan, magenta, and yellow colour spaces.
HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports supp: HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support ULTRA HD Deep Colour.

If it's turned on and you connect a devi: If it's turned on and you connect a device that also supports ULTRA HD Deep Colour, your picture may be clearer.
If you turn it off, all tuned CAM channe: If you turn it off, all tuned CAM programmes will not be available and notifications will no longer be provided.
If you turn this option on, color temper: If you turn this option on, colour temperature will be automatically adjusted to reduce eye strain.
If you turn this option on, you can rece: If you turn this option on, you can receive the notifications of programmes which you have been watching frequently.
If your device does not support this fea: If your device does not support this feature, it may not work properly. In that case, you can connect the device to a different HDMI port or turn the HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Colour setting off.

Import/export your TV's channel list inf: Import/export your TV's programme list information from/to a connected USB device.
Maximize contrast by increasing the inte: Maximise contrast by increasing the intensity of bright and dark areas of the screen.
Note: Available options depend on the br: Note: Available options depend on the broadcast programme.

SIMPLINK lets you use your LG Remote to: SIMPLINK lets you use your LG Remote to control other SIMPLINK-enabled devices, like a DVD player or audio home theatre system, that are connected to your LG Smart TV by HDMI.
Save the Color Management System setting: Save the Colour Management System settings from the currently selected picture mode for all inputs.
Save the current customized setting valu: Save the current customised setting values to currently selected picture mode for all inputs.
Select audio language for digital broadc: Select audio language for digital broadcasts. For programmes that do not support multiple languages, the default will be used.
Select audio language for digital broadcasts. The default language is selected when the programme does not support multiple languages.
Select caption settings for analog broad: Select caption settings for analogue broadcasts.
Select caption size, color, transparency: Select caption size, colour, transparency, and other options for digital broadcasts.
Select digital audio output format. When: Select digital audio output format. When the programme does not support the selected output format, the default output from the source will be used.
Select the channel to use when the TV tu: Select the programme to use when the TV turns on.
Select your first choice of audio langua: Select your first choice of audio language for digital broadcasts. For programmes that do not support multiple languages, the default will be used.
Select your second choice of audio langu: Select your second choice of audio language for digital broadcasts. For programmes that do not support multiple languages, the default will be used.
Set System Color mode for your current T: Set System Colour mode for your current TV input.

Set color balance by adjusting color tem: Set colour balance by adjusting colour temperature, luminance, and red, green and blue gain controls.

Store Mode is for in-store display purpo: Store Mode is for in-store display purposes. It will re-initialise the settings every few minutes. Do you want to close this app and start the Store Mode?

This setting puts your TV in standby mod: This setting switches your TV in standby mode when it's turned off so it will start up more quickly the next time it's turned on.
Tune and save available channels. You ca: Tune and save available programmes. You can set satellite programme options.
Turn on the advertising frequency cappin: Turn on the advertising frequency capping cookies. This keeps on tracking the number of times an Ad is shown on your TV and is used to help limit the number of times the same Ad is displayed.
Turn on/off ULTRA HD Deep Color for HDMI: Turn on/off ULTRA HD Deep Colour for HDMI {num} port.
Turn on/off captioning for hearing-impai: Turn on/off captioning for hearing-impaired people. Programme must support feature to work.
When the program does not support the la: When the programme does not support the language that you have selected, the default language will be shown.
When turned on, the background and text: When turned on, the background and text colour on some menus will be adjusted to enhance contrasts between bright and dark areas.
Wi-Fi Direct lets you connect your TV wi: Wi-Fi Direct lets you connect your TV wirelessly to other Wi-Fi Direct-enabled devices, like a mobile phone or computer, without having to connect to a wireless router.
You can use your Magic Remote to determi: You can use your Magic Remote to determine the room’s acoustics and optimise your TV’s sound quality based on the results.
